title: Resolve installation path issue for consumer installations
description:

- Option A: Consumers copy entire src/ structure and run ./src/rooda.sh
- Option B: Update rooda-config.yml during install to use prompts/ paths (requires sed/awk)

Affects: Phase 6, Phase 8, all installation instructions
Impact: Blocking - must resolve before execution
